metadata.title: CVE-2016-4738 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
libxslt in Apple iOS before 10, OS X before 10.12, tvOS before 10, andwatchOS before 3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or causea denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted web site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4738` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxslt1.1 - 1.1.28-2ubuntu0.1
python-libxslt1 - 1.1.28-2ubuntu0.1
xsltproc - 1.1.28-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxslt package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.28-2ubuntu0.1').
